name: Physics Draw 2D for Unity - sample scene
name_original: Physics Draw 2D for Unity - sample scene
description:
The Physics Draw 2D is a simple system to boost your project with a 2D drawing mechanic, where each drawing works with the physics engine by having Rigidbody 2D and a Polygon Collider 2D.

The system is an upgrade from "2D Physics Draw with Collider". It can be added to any 2D game project and be configured to fit the game with simple configurations of the drawing template and the general settings.

On the Unity Asset Store!

More at MeadowGames.com
